title: How to Do Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutation)

steps.title: Join your palms and stand straight.
steps.content: Join your palms and stand straight. Make the salutation: ॐ मित्राय नमः (om mitrāya namaḥ).

steps.title: Raise your hands and stretch them back.
steps.content: Raise your hands and stretch them back. Make the salutation: ॐ रवये नमः (om ravaye namaḥ.)

steps.title: Bend down and try to hold your ankles with your hands.
steps.content: Bend down and try to hold your ankles with your hands. Make the salutation: ॐ सूर्याय नमः (om sūryāya namaḥ). [2] X Research source

steps.title: Place the right foot at the back, left foot under the torso and look straight.
steps.content: Place the right foot at the back, left foot under the torso and look straight. Make the salutation: ॐ भानवे नमः (om bhānava namaḥ). [3] X Research source

steps.title: Put both legs together at the back, keep your elbow straight and keep your spine straight.
steps.content: Put both legs together at the back, keep your elbow straight and keep your spine straight. Make the salutation: ॐ खगाय नमः (om khagāya namaḥ). [4] X Research source

steps.title: Bend your elbows and push your body towards the floor, keeping it stiff like a push-up.
steps.content: Bend your elbows and push your body towards the floor, keeping it stiff like a push-up. Make the salutation: ॐ पूष्णे नमः (om pūṣṇe namaḥ).

steps.title: Push your hips towards the floor, hands straight, chest up and stretch your shoulders up.
steps.content: Push your hips towards the floor, hands straight, chest up and stretch your shoulders up. Make the salutation: ॐ हिरण्यगर्भाय नमः (om hiraṇya garbhāya namaḥ). [5] X Research source

steps.title: Keep your hands in the same position, raise your hip and back to form a curve.
steps.content: Keep your hands in the same position, raise your hip and back to form a curve. Make the salutation: ॐ मरीचये नमः (om marīcaye namaḥ).

steps.title: Retract to form position as in step 4 using the opposite legs.
steps.content: Retract to form position as in step 4 using the opposite legs. Make the salutation: ॐ आदित्याय नमः (om ādityāya namaḥ).

steps.title: Retract to form position as in step 3.
steps.content: Retract to form position as in step 3. Make the salutation: ॐ सवित्रे नमः (om savitre namaḥ).

steps.title: Stand straight as you raise your hands above your head.
steps.content: Stand straight as you raise your hands above your head. This is the same as step 2, without a stretch. Make the salutation: ॐ अर्काय नमः (om arkāya namaḥ).

steps.title: Bring your hands back to the position in step 1.
steps.content: Bring your hands back to the position in step 1. Make the salutation: ॐ भास्कराय नमः (om bhāskarāya namaḥ).
